debates.showAs: Central Bank (Amendment) Bill 2025: Referral to Select Committee [Private Members]
Central Bank (Amendment) Bill 2025: Second Stage [Private Members]
Central Bank (Amendment) Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Central Bank Act 1942 and prohibit financial service providers from discriminating against survivors of cancer from accessing financial services and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú Acht an Bhainc Cheannais, 1942 agus do thoirmeasc ar sholáthraithe seirbhíse airgeadais idirdhealú a dhéanamh i gcoinne daoine a bheidh tagtha slán ón ailse maidir le rochtain a fháil ar sheirbhísí airgeadais agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Non-Fatal Offences Against the Person (Amendment) Bill 2024: Committee Stage
Non-Fatal Offences Against the Person (Amendment) Bill 2024: Second Stage
Non-Fatal Offences against the Person (Amendment) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for an offence for the action commonly known as catfishing and for that purpose to provide for the identification of such an offence; to amend and extend the Non-Fatal Offences Against the Person Act 1997 and to provide for consequential amendments to the Broadcasting Act 2009; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le cion arb éard é an gníomh ar a dtugtar de ghnáth claonmhealltóireacht ar líne agus, chun na críche sin, do dhéanamh socrú chun cion den sórt sin a shainaithint; do leasú agus do leathnú an Achta um Chionta Neamh-Mharfacha in aghaidh an Duine, 1997 agus do dhéanamh socrú maidir le leasuithe iarmhartacha ar an Acht Craolacháin, 2009; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Non-Fatal Offences Against the Person (Amendment) Bill 2024
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chionta Neamh-Mharfacha in aghaidh an Duine (Leasú), 2024

debates.showAs: Health (Postponement of Certain Leave) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend and extend the Maternity Protection Act 1994 and the Adoptive Leave Act 1995 and for those purposes to provide a mechanism to postpone maternity leave or adoptive leave in circumstances where a person is diagnosed with or being treated for cancer and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú agus do leathnú an Achta um Chosaint Mháithreachais, 1994 agus an Achta um Shaoire Uchtaíoch, 1995 agus chun na gcríoch sin do sholáthar sásra chun saoire mháithreachais nó saoire uchtaíoch a iarchur in imthosca ina bhfáthmheastar go bhfuil ailse ar dhuine nó ina bhfuil cóireáil in aghaidh ailse á cur ar dhuine agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Sláinte (Saoire Áirithe a Iarchur), 2024

debates.showAs: Health (Assisted Human Reproduction) Bill 2023: Second Stage
Health (Assisted Human Reproduction) Bill 2023: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the establishment of a body, to be known in the Irish language as An Coiste Comhairleach um Chóireáil Atáirgthe Dhaonna Chuidithe or in the English language as the Assisted Human Reproduction Treatment Advisory Committee, to advise on criteria for eligibility for financial assistance with assisted human reproduction treatment and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do bhunú comhlacht ar a dtabharfar, sa Ghaeilge, An Coiste Comhairleach um Chóireáil Atáirgthe Dhaonna Chuidithe, nó sa Bhéarla, the Assisted Human Reproduction Treatment Advisory Committee, chun comhairle a thabhairt maidir le critéir incháilitheachta le haghaidh cúnamh airgeadais i ndáil le hatáirgeadh daonna cuidithe agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Remuneration Information and Pay Transparency Bill 2023: Second Stage
Remuneration Information and Pay Transparency Bill 2023: Second Stage (Resumed)
Remuneration Information and Pay Transparency Bill 2023: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to make further and better provision for equality between employed persons by providing for transparency in respect of matters relating to remuneration, and for that and other purposes to amend the Employment Equality Acts 1998 to 2021 and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú breise agus feabhsaithe maidir le comhionannas idir daoine fostaithe trí shocrú a dhéanamh maidir le trédhearcacht i leith nithe a bhaineann le luach saothair agus, chun na críche sin agus chun críoch eile, do leasú na nAchtanna um Chomhionannas Fostaíochta, 1998 go 2021 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Remuneration Information and Pay Transparency Bill 2023
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Fhaisnéis faoi Luach Saothair agus um Thrédhearcacht Pá, 2023

debates.showAs: Central Bank (Amendment) Bill 2022: Second Stage
Central Bank (Amendment) Bill 2022: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Central Bank Act 1942 and prohibit financial service providers from discriminating against survivors of cancer from accessing financial services and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú Acht an Bhainc Cheannais, 1942 agus do thoirmeasc ar sholáthraithe seirbhíse airgeadais idirdhealú a dhéanamh i gcoinne daoine a bheidh tagtha slán ón ailse maidir le rochtain a fháil ar sheirbhísí airgeadais agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Horticultural Peat (Temporary Measures) Bill 2021: Second Stage
Horticultural Peat (Temporary Measures) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Planning and Development Acts 2000 to 2021 and the Environmental Protection Agency Acts 1992 to 2011 to make exceptional provision for peat extraction for the purpose of horticulture for a temporary period in the public interest in order to mitigate the adverse consequences resulting, or likely to result from an interruption to supply and to provide for a just transition.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú na nAchtanna um Pleanáil agus Forbairt, 2000 go 2021 agus na nAchtanna fán nGníomhaireacht um Chaomhnú Comhshaoil, 1992 go 2011 chun socrú eisceachtúil a dhéanamh maidir le baint móna chun críche gairneoireachta ar feadh tréimhse shealadach ar mhaithe le leas an phobail d’fhonn maolú a dhéanamh ar na hiarmhairtí dochracha a bheidh, nó is dóigh a bheidh, mar thoradh ar bhriseadh ar sholáthar agus do dhéanamh socrú maidir le trasdul cóir.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Móin Ghairneoireachta (Bearta Sealadacha), 2021

debates.showAs: Free Provision of Period Products Bill 2021: Second Stage
Free Provision of Period Products Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to secure the Provision of free period products.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht chun soláthar táirgí míosta saor in aisce a áirithiú.
bill.shortTitleEn: Free Provision of Period Products Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Tháirgí Míosta a Sholáthar Saor in Aisce, 2021

debates.showAs: Housing (Housing Assistance Payment Waiting Times) (Miscellaneous Provisions) (Amendment) Bill 2019: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Housing (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2009, Housing (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2014 and subsequent regulations to reduce social housing and housing assistance payment scheme assessment times.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú Acht na dTithe (Forálacha Ilghnéitheacha), 2009, Acht na dTithe (Forálacha Ilghnéitheacha), 2014 agus rialacháin dá éis sin chun na tréimhsí measúnachta a laghdú maidir le tithíocht shóisialta agus maidir leis an scéim um íocaíocht cúnaimh tithíochta.
bill.shortTitleEn: Housing (Housing Assistance Payment Waiting Times) (Miscellaneous Provisions) (Amendment) Bill 2019
bill.shortTitleGa: Bille na dTithe (Tréimhsí Feithimh maidir le hÍocaíocht Cúnaimh Tithíochta) (Forálacha Ilghnéitheacha) (Leasú), 2019

debates.showAs: Prohibition of Conversion Therapies Bill 2018: Second Stage
Prohibition of Conversion Therapies Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to prohibit conversion therapy, as a deceptive and harmful act or practice against a person's sexual orientation, gender identity and, or gender expression.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do thoirmeasc teiripe thiontúcháin mar ghníomh nó cleachtas meabhlach agus dochrach in aghaidh gnéaschlaonadh, féiniúlacht inscne agus/nó léiriú inscne duine.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thoirmeasc ar Theiripí Tiontúcháin, 2018

act.longTitleEn: Act to amend the Landlord and Tenant (Ground Rents) (No. 2) Act 1978 so as to better enable a lessee to acquire fee simple; and to provide for related matters
act.longTitleGa: Acht do leasú an Achta um Thiarnaí Talún agus Tionóntaí (Bunchíosanna) (Uimh. 2), 1978 chun a chumasú ar bhealach níos fearr do léasaí feo simplí a fháil; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
act.shortTitleGa: An tAcht um Thiarnaí Talún agus Tionóntaí (Bunchíosanna) (Leasú), 2019

Landlord and Tenant (Ground Rents) (Amendment) Bill 2017: Committee and Remaining Stages
Landlord and Tenant (Ground Rents) (Amendment) Bill 2017: Second Stage
Landlord and Tenant (Ground Rents) (Amendment) Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Landlord and Tenant (Ground Rents) (No. 2) Act 1978 so as to better enable a lessee to acquire fee simple; and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Thiarnaí Talún agus Tionóntaí (Bunchíosanna) (Uimh. 2), 1978 chun a chumasú ar bhealach níos fearr do léasaí feo simplí a fháil; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara

version.showAs: An tAcht um Thiarnaí Talún agus Tionóntaí (Bunchíosanna) (Leasú), 2019
As amended in Committee/Select Committee [Dáil Éireann]

debates.showAs: Litter Pollution (Amendment) Bill 2017: Second Stage
Litter Pollution (Amendment) Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Litter Pollution Act 1997 to provide for increased fines where a person is convicted of an offence under that Act; and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Thruailliú ó Bhruscar, 1997 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le fíneálacha méadaithe i gcás go gciontaítear duine i gcion faoin Acht sin; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thruailliú ó Bhruscar (Leasú), 2017

act.longTitleEn: Act to provide for the recognition of Irish Sign Language and for that purpose to set down principles to guide the operations of public bodies; to require public bodies to prepare and implement action plans on Irish Sign Language; to provide for classes for the parents of deaf children; to permit the use of Irish Sign Language in legal proceedings; to provide for the making available of sign language interpreting services; to introduce statutory targets regarding the accessibility of television programming; to provide for the regulation of Irish Sign Language interpreters, deaf interpreters and Irish Sign Language teachers and for that purpose to establish the Irish Sign Language Council; to provide for the establishment of registers; to provide for continuing education requirements; to provide for offences; to amend the Broadcasting Act 2009; and to provide for related matters
act.longTitleGa: Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le haitheantas a thabhairt do Theanga Chomharthaíochta na hÉireann agus chun na críche sin do leagan síos prionsabal chun oibríochtaí comhlachtaí poiblí a threorú; dá cheangal ar chomhlachtaí poiblí pleananna gníomhaíochta ar Theanga Chomharthaíochta na hÉireann a ullmhú agus a chur i ngníomh; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le ranganna do thuismitheoirí leanaí bodhra; do cheadú Teanga Chomharthaíochta na hÉireann a úsáid in imeachtaí dlí; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le seirbhísí ateangaireachta teanga comharthaíochta a chur ar fáil; do thabhairt isteach spriocanna reachtúla maidir le hinrochtaineacht ar chláir theilifíse; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le rialáil a dhéanamh ar ateangairí Theanga Chomharthaíochta na hÉireann, ar ateangairí do na bodhair agus ar mhúinteoirí Theanga Chomharthaíochta na hÉireann agus chun na críche sin do bhunú na Comhairle um Theanga Chomharthaíochta na hÉireann; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le cláir a bhunú; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le riachtanais leantacha oideachais; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le cionta; do leasú an Achta Craolacháin, 2009; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
act.shortTitleGa: An tAcht um Theanga Chomharthaíochta na hÉireann, 2017

amendmentList.showAs: Cream List [Dáil amendments to Seanad Bill]

debates.showAs: Irish Sign Language Bill 2016: [Seanad Bill amended by the Dáil] Report and Final Stages
Recognition of Irish Sign Language for the Deaf Community Bill 2016 [Seanad]: Second Stage
Recognition of Irish Sign Language for the Deaf Community Bill 2016 [Seanad]: Committee and Remaining Stages
Recognition of Irish Sign Language for the Deaf Community Bill 2016: Report and Final Stages
Recognition of Irish Sign Language for the Deaf Community Bill 2016: Committee Stage
Recognition of Irish Sign Language for the Deaf Community Bill 2016: Second Stage
Recognition of Irish Sign Language for the Deaf Community Bill 2016: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the recognition of Irish Sign Language and for that purpose to set down principles to guide the operations of public bodies; to require public bodies to prepare and implement action plans on Irish Sign Language; to provide for classes for the parents of deaf children; to permit the use of Irish Sign Language in legal proceedings; to provide for the making available of sign language interpreting services; to introduce statutory targets regarding the accessibility of television programming; to provide for the regulation of Irish Sign Language interpreters, deaf interpreters and Irish Sign Language teachers and for that purpose to establish the Irish Sign Language Council; to provide for the establishment of registers; to provide for continuing education requirements; to provide for offences; to amend the Broadcasting Act 2009; and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le haitheantas a thabhairt do Theanga Chomharthaíochta na hÉireann agus chun na críche sin do leagan síos prionsabal chun oibríochtaí comhlachtaí poiblí a threorú; dá cheangal ar chomhlachtaí poiblí pleananna gníomhaíochta ar Theanga Chomharthaíochta na hÉireann a ullmhú agus a chur i ngníomh; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le ranganna do thuismitheoirí leanaí bodhra; do cheadú Teanga Chomharthaíochta na hÉireann a úsáid in imeachtaí dlí; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le seirbhísí ateangaireachta teanga comharthaíochta a chur ar fáil; do thabhairt isteach spriocanna reachtúla maidir le hinrochtaineacht ar chláir theilifíse; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le rialáil a dhéanamh ar ateangairí Theanga Chomharthaíochta na hÉireann, ar ateangairí do na bodhair agus ar mhúinteoirí Theanga Chomharthaíochta na hÉireann agus chun na críche sin do bhunú na Comhairle um Theanga Chomharthaíochta na hÉireann; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le cláir a bhunú; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le riachtanais leantacha oideachais; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le cionta; do leasú an Achta Craolacháin, 2009; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Theanga Chomharthaíochta na hÉireann 2016

debates.showAs: Registration of Wills Bill 2016 [Seanad]: Restoration to Order Paper
Registration of Wills Bill 2016: Committee and Remaining Stages
Registration of Wills Bill 2016: Second Stage
Registration of Wills Bill 2016: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the extension of the civil registration service to the registration of certain information regarding wills and for those purposes to revise the law relating to the civil registration service and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir leis an tSeirbhís um Chlárú Sibhialta a leathnú chuig clárú faisnéise áirithe maidir le huachtanna agus chun na gcríoch sin d'athmheas an dlí a bhaineann leis an tSeirbhís um Chlárú Sibhialta agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
